outputs.output_descr: The Standards and Labeling programme (S&L) for appliances and equipments will be a key market transformation strategy that will contribute to achieving the 10%  in reduction in energy demand within the residential sector by 2015 based on the SA government's revision of the National Energy Efficiency Strategy in response to electricity crisis of 2008. it will also help to reduce the GHG emissions and ensure efficient use of electricity.

project_title: Market Transformation through Energy Efficiency Standard
